name: A Deep Breath
description:
Hold SPACE to give yourself some headspace. Then RELEASE it to release the stress and worries. Repeat for as long as you want. Smooth sailing! (by the way, get your headphones ready)

This compact experience was created by Andrey Tikhonov and Valerii Kholopov during the Ludum Dare 48 Jam. In an attempt to creatively interpret the topic of the jam which stated  "Deeper and deeper" we have created a compact yet infinitely huge world to explore — the depth of your own mind, calm and peaceful.
